# {{lb|fr|computing}} [[hacking]], unauthorized attempts to bypass the security mechanisms of an information system or network
types.html:
piratage informatique m (plural piratages informatiques)

  1. (computing) hacking, unauthorized attempts to bypass the security mechanisms of an information system or network
trans: hacking, unauthorized attempts to bypass the security mechanisms of an information system or network
